CustomField.description: The primary name of the highest level parent within a corporate family tree. A parent is a corporation that owns more than 50% of another corporation's capital stock. A subject may be its own global ultimate.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The primary name of the highest level parent within a corporate family tree. A parent is a corporation that owns more than 50% of another corporation's capital stock. A subject may be its own global ultimate.
CustomField.label: Global Ultimate Business Name
